data: If the mission of the little school-house in Holly Cove was to impress upon the youthful mind a comprehension and appreciation of the eternal verities of nature, its site could hardly have been better chosen.
Craddock, Charles Egbert, 1850-1922; Frost, A. B. (Arthur Burdett), 1851-1928 [Illustrator]
